name: UISearchControllerDelegate
desc: A set of delegate methods for search controller objects.

items.name: func didDismissSearchController(UISearchController)
items.desc: Called when the search controller has been automatically dismissed.

items.name: func didPresentSearchController(UISearchController)
items.desc: Called when the search controller has been automatically presented.

items.name: func willDismissSearchController(UISearchController)
items.desc: Called when the search controller is to be automatically dismissed.

items.name: func willPresentSearchController(UISearchController)
items.desc: Called when the search controller is to be automatically displayed.
